author: BetterWang
body:
[+] back port EP code #9022 to 74X
In order to develop Q2 trigger for HI data taking, we are advised to port #9022 to 74X.
So, a HLT template can be made to trigger development.
This update will not change the HI workflow, and is not related to any HLT related software.
The only change will be the EventPlane data format in HI event content.
title: HeavyIon EP code backport
